attributes.action: Stop this active discrimination against British people when applying for jobs, they should be given precidence over foreingers for unskilled jobs.
attributes.additional_details: Employers are actively discriminating against the British for unskilled jobs regardless of experience or age, this activity must be stopped and British people should be given these vacancies and not the europeans.  Employers also actively discriminate against the older applicant these practises are grossly unfair.
